name: Serious Protection
description: Whereas most conventional sunscreens only protect against surface, sun-burning UVB light, Serious Protectionâ€™s guard extends to deeper skin layers vulnerable to photoaging. Containing a non-irritating, chemical-free, titanium dioxide and zinc oxide formula, this broad spectrum solution effectively shields against both UVA and UVB light to keep skin naturally safe. Net Wt. 100ml

name: Cosmedix Cleanser
description:
*Benefit Clean*
A safe and gentle cleanser for all skin types
Enhanced with shea butter and a specialized, impurity-filtering mineral, Benefit Clean is a safe and gentle cleanser designed to calm and protect all skin types. Using zeolite, a unique ingredient from volcanoes, this cleanser gently purges the skin of heavy metals, environmental pollutants, makeup and dirt. Net Wt. 100ml


*Purity Clean*
Deep clean and exfoliate for a clear complexion
Purity Clean is a concentrated, exfoliating cleanser infused with peppermint essential oil to cool the skin and stimulate circulation. This refreshing cleanser penetrates deep, eliminating cellular debris, decongesting pores and hydrating, to keep normal to oily skin healthy and glowing. Net Wt. 100ml

name: Sharing is Caring FACIAL - Gift Certificate
description:
Give the gift of pampering

Give that special someone the gift of relaxation or attention to that problem area they've been meaning to take care of but haven't had the time or the money to. There's no better time than now.

name: Cosmedix Eye Believe Serum
description:
#1 Bestseller
Age-defying liquid crystal eye serum
With liquid crystals to replenish damaged, thinning skin around the eyes and growth factors and alpha lipoic acid to dramatically diminish the appearance of eye lines and wrinkles, Opti Crystal is the ultimate tool in anti-aging eye care. A chirally correct blend of protective, corrective and cell-stimulating ingredients, this powerful eye serum actively revitalizes delicate skin for a radiant, younger-looking finish. Net Wt. 7g

name: Cosmedix Correct Kit
description: Comprehensive skin correction program This collection of all-natural products gives the invigorating experience of a healthy skin correction program. Containing a blend of skin-selective antioxidants, hydroquinone-free skin brighteners, CosMedix's stimulating proprietary retinol complex and chemical-free sun protection, the Correct Kit is beneficial for all skin types seeking refreshment and renewal. This skin correction program includes: Benefit Clean: this gentle cleanser calms and protects the skin while aggressively targeting free radicals. Net Wt. 15ml Affirm: dramatically reduce the look of environmental and sun damage with this antioxidant firming serum. Net Wt. 15ml Define: this vitamin A resurfacing treatment pushes the skin to a very dynamic yet well-tolerated level of remodeling. Net Wt. 15ml Hydrate +: this light, daily antioxidant moisturizer hydrates the skin and shields it from sun exposure. Net Wt. 15ml
